RoboLogo - quickstart tutorial

  1. Click on the Start button on the home page
  2. Click on open/download to open the application in the browser or download it to your computer
  3. If you have a Lego TM robot in your classroom ask your teacher for the 'host' name
  4. Enter your username and password (for example user1, user1) and click login
  5. Open one of your files, or create a new file
  6. Have fun exploring Logo!

Please ensure that you have Java installed on your computer (http://www.java.com/en/download/manual.jsp)
